main event: In August 1959, a high-speed unidentified object was observed by ground-radar near Cape Canaveral, Florida.
interesting points: The object was tracked by both pilot and ground-radar,The object was described as a reddish-yellow ball of light,The observation lasted for about 7-8 minutes,The object appeared to make several passes before disappearing,Conclusions leaned towards the object possibly being a balloon, despite it being unconfirmed.
